title: Carnival expands shore excursion offerings
text:
Carnival Cruise Lines has expanded its shore excursion offerings, with customised private tours and complimentary beach side activities. 
The line is also offering free tours in selected ports for children under the age of five. 
Meanwhile exclusive private tours are being offered via custom coaches, sailboats, yachts and helicopters, to take guests “off the beaten path”. 
Erika Tache, Carnival’s director of product development said: “Shore excursions are an important part of the Carnival holiday experience and we’ve gone to great lengths to provide our guests with even more choices and offer families unique value-added services and pricing options that are exclusive to Carnival.”
